S03n247:1: nātmaduḥkhena tathā santaḥ saṃtapyante yathāpakāriṇāṃ kuśalapakṣahānyā |
S03n247:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila śrīmati himavatpārśve vividhadhāturuciracitrāṅgarāge nīlakauśeyaprāvārakṛtottarāsaṅga iva vanagahanalakṣmyā prayatnaracitairivānekavarṇasaṃsthānavikalpairvaiṣamyabhakticitrairvibhūṣitataṭāntadeśe pravisṛtanaikaprasravaṇajale gambhīrakandarāntaraprapātasaṃkule paṭutaramadhukaranināde manojñamārutopavījyamānavicitrapuṣpaphalapādape vidyādharākrīḍabhute mahākāyaḥ kapirekacaro babhuva |
S03n247:4: tadavasthamapi cainamapariluptadharmasaṃjñaṃ kṛtajñamakṣudrasvabhāvaṃ dhṛtyā mahatyā samanvitamanurāgavaśādiva karuṇā naiva mumoca |
S03n247:5: sakānanā sādrivarā sasāgarā gatā vināśaṃ śataśo vasuṃdharā |
S03n247:7: atha sa mahātmā tāpasa iva vanaruparṇaphalamātravṛttiranukampamānastena tena vidhinā gocarapatitān prāṇinastamaraṇyapradeśamadhyavasati sma |
S03n247:8: athānyatamaḥ puruṣo gāṃ pranaṣṭāmanveṣituṃ kṛtodyogaḥ samantato'nuvicaran mārgāpranaṣṭo digbhāgasaṃmūḍhamatiḥ paribhramaṃstaṃ deśamupajagāma |
S03n247:9: sa kṣutpipāsādharmaśramaparimlānatanurdaurmanasyavahninā cāntaḥpradīpyamāno viṣādātibhārādivānyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇo dadarśa paripākavaśādvicyutāni paripiñjarāṇi katicittindukīphalāni |
S03n247:10: sa tānyāsvādya kṣutparikṣāmatayā paramasvādūni manyamānastatprabhavānveṣaṇaṃ pratyabhivṛddhotsāhaḥ samantato'nuvilokayan dadarśa prapātataṭāntavirūḍhaṃ paripakkaphalānamitapiñjarāgraśākhaṃ tindukīvṛkṣam |
S03n247:11: sa tatphalatṛṣṇayākṛṣyamāṇastaṃ giritaṭamadhiruhya tasya tindukīvṛkṣasya phaliniṃ śākhāṃ prapātābhinatāmadhyāruroha phalalobhena cāsyāḥ prāntamupajagāma |
S03n247:12: śākhātha sā tasya mahīruhasya bhārātiyogānnamitā kṛśatvāt |
S03n247:14: sa tayā sārdhaṃ mahati giridurge samantataḥ śailabhittiparikṣipte kūpa iva nyapatat |
S03n247:16: sa tasmāduttīrya salilātsamantataḥ parisarpanna kutaściduttaraṇamārgaṃ dadarśa |
S03n247:17: sa nispratīkāraṃ martavyamiha mayā nacirāditi visrasyamānajīvitāśaḥ śokāśrupariṣiktadīnavadanastrīvreṇa daurmanasyaśalyena pratudyamānaḥ kātarahṛdayastattadārtivaśād vilalāp |
S03n247:19: yatnādapi parimṛgayan mṛtyoranyaḥ ka iva paśyet ||3 ||
S03n247:26: iti sa puruṣastattadvilapaṃstena salilena taiśca sahanipatitaistindukaphalairvartayamānaḥ katiciddināni tatrāvasat |
S03n247:27: atha sa mahākapirāhārahetostadvanamanuvicarannāhūyamān iva mārutākampitābhistasya tindukīvṛkṣasyāgraśākhābhistaṃ pradeśamabhijagāma |
S03n247:28: abhiruhya cainaṃ tatprapātamavalokayan dadarśa taṃ puruṣaṃ kṣutparikṣāmanayanavadanaṃ paripāṇḍukṛśadīnagātraṃ paryutsukaṃ tatra viceṣṭamānam |
S03n247:29: sa tasya paridyūnatayā samāvajitānukampo mahākapirnikṣiptāhāravyāpārastaṃ puruṣaṃ pratataṃ bikṣamāṇo mānuṣīṃ vācamuvāca-
S03n247:31: vaktumahaṃsi tatsādhu ko bhavāhina vā kutaḥ ||6 ||
S03n247:32: atha sa puruṣastaṃ mahākapimārtatayā samabhipraṇamyodvīkṣamāṇaḥ sāñjaliruvāca-
S03n247:40: athainaṃ bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāyamāṇastatkāladurlabhena snigdhena vacasā samāśvāsayāmāsa-
S03n247:42: yadvandhukṛtyaṃ tava kiṃcidatra kartāsmi tatsarvamalaṃ bhayena ||10 ||
S03n247:43: iti sa mahāsattvastaṃ puruṣamāśvāsya tataścāsmai tindukānyaparāṇi ca phalāni samupahṛtya taduddharaṇayogyayā puruṣabhāragurvyā śilayānyatra yogyāṃ cakāra |
S03n247:44: tataścātmano balapramāṇamavagamya śakto'hamenametasmātprapātādurddhartumiti niścitamatiravatīrya prapātaṃ karuṇayā paricodyamānastaṃ puruṣamuvāca-
S03n247:45: ehi pṛṣṭhaṃ mamāruhya sulagno'stu bhavān mayi |
S03n247:47: asārasya śarīrasya sāro hyeṣa mataḥ satām |
S03n247:50: athābhirūḍhaḥ sa nareṇa tena bharātiyogena vihanyamānaḥ |
S03n247:54: atha bodhisattvaḥ śuddhasvabhāvatayā kṛtopakāratvācca tasmātpuruṣādapāyanirāśaṅko visrambhādenamuvāca-
S03n247:56: khedaprasuptaṃ sahasā nihanti kaścitpurā māṃ svahitodayaṃ ca ||15 ||
S03n247:57: yato bhavān dikṣuṃ vikīrṇacakṣuḥ karotu rakṣāṃ mama cātmanaśca |
S03n247:59: atha sa mithyāvinayapragalbhaḥ-svapitu bhavān yathākāmaṃ sukhaprabodhāya,
S03n247:61: atha sa puruṣastasmin mahāsattve śramabalānnidrāvaśamupagate cintāmaśivāmāpede-
S03n247:63: evaṃ parikṣīṇatanoḥ kathaṃ syādyātrāpi tāvatkuta eva puṣṭiḥ ||17 ||
S03n247:64: idaṃ ca kāntāramasupratāraṃ kathaṃ tariṣyāmi balena hīnaḥ |
S03n247:65: paryāptarūpaṃ tvidamasya māṃsaṃ kāntāradurgottaraṇāya me syāt ||18 ||
S03n247:66: kṛtopakāro'pi ca bhakṣya eva nisargayogaḥ sa hi tādṛśo'sya |
S03n247:69: imaṃ hi yuddhābhimukhaṃ sametya siṃho'pi saṃbhāvyaparājayaḥ syāt ||20 ||
S03n247:70: tannāyaṃ vilambituṃ me kāla iti viniścitya sa durātmā lobhadoṣavyāmohitamatirakṛtajño vipannadharmasaṃjñaḥ pranaṣṭakāruṇyasaumyasvabhāvaḥ paridurbalo'pyakāryātirāgānmahatīṃ śilāmudyamya tasya mahākapeḥ śirasi mumoca |
S03n247:73: sarvātmanā sā na samāsasāda mūrdhānamasmānna vinispipeṣa |
S03n247:74: koṭyekadeśena tu taṃ rujantī śīlā tale sāśanivatpapāta ||22 ||
S03n247:76: kenāhato'smīti dadarśa nānyaṃ tameva tu hrītamukhaṃ dadarśa ||23 ||
S03n247:79: atha sa mahākapirasyaiva tatkarmeti niscitamatiḥ svamabhighātaduḥkhamacintayitvā tena tasyātmahitanirapekṣeṇātikaṣṭena karmaṇā samupajātasaṃvegakāruṇyaḥ parityattakrodhasaṃrambhadoṣaḥ sabāspayanayanastaṃ puruṣamavekṣya samanuśocannuvāca-
S03n247:81: kathaṃ nāma vyavasitaṃ prārabdhaṃ kathameva vā ||25 ||
S03n247:94: dunoti māṃ naiva tathā tviyaṃ rujā
S03n247:102: ekākinaṃ kṣāmaśarīrakaṃ tvāṃ mārganabhijñaṃ hi vane bhramantam |
S03n247:104: iti sa mahātmā taṃ puruṣamanuśocañjanāntamānīya pratipādya cainaṃ tanmārgaṃ punaruvāca-
S03n247:109: iti sa mahākapistaṃ puruṣamanukampayā śiṣyamivānuśiṣya tameva vanapradeśaṃ pratijagāma |
S03n247:110: atha sa puruṣastadatikasṭaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtvā paścāttāpavahninā saṃpradīpyamānacetāmahatā kuṣṭhavyādhinā rūpāntaramupanītaḥ kilāsacitracchaviḥ prabhidyamānavraṇavisravārdragātraḥ paramadurgandhaśarīraḥ sadyaḥ samapadyata |
S03n247:111: sa yaṃ yaṃ deśamabhijagāma tatastata evainamatibībhatsavikṛtataradarśanaṃ mānuṣa ityaśraddheyarūpaṃ bhinnadīnasvaramabhivīkṣya puruṣāḥ sākṣadayaṃ pāṣmeti manyamānāḥ samudyataloṣṭadaṇḍā nirbhartsanaparuṣavacasaḥ pravāsayāmāsuḥ |
S03n247:112: athainamanyatamo rājā mṛgayāmanuvicaran pretamivāraṇye paribhramantaṃ prakṣīṇamalinavasanaṃ nātipracchannakaupīnamatidurdaśanamabhivīkṣya sasādhvasakautūhalaḥ papraccha-
S03n247:115: kastvaṃ pretaḥ piśāco vā mūrtaḥ pāṣmātha pūtanaḥ |
S03n247:117: sa taṃ dīnena kaṇṭhena samabhipraṇamannuvāca-mānuso'smi mahārāja,
S03n247:119: tatkathamimāmavasthāmanuprāpto'sīti ca paryanuyukto rājñā tadasmai svaṃ duścaritamāviṣkṛtyovāca-
S03n247:132: imaṃ viditvā nṛpa mitrapakṣe prabhāvasiddhī sadasatpravṛttyoḥ |
S03n247:133: bhajasva mārga sujanābhipannaṃ tena prayātamanuyāti bhūtiḥ ||42 ||
S03n247:134: tadevaṃ nātmaduḥkhena tathā santaḥ saṃtapyante yathāpakāriṇāṃ kuśalapakṣahānyā |
S03n247:136: satkṛtya dharmaśravaṇe kṣāntikathāyāṃ mitrānabhidrohe pāpakarmādinavapradarśane ceti |
